foldername: Symbols of environmental challenges(animal, country, relation, Latin American, English)

images.filename: A photo of a sign.jpg
images.description: A photo of a sign

images.filename: A Pampas eagle in flight.jpg
images.description: A Pampas eagle in flight

images.filename: A photo of a 'No Fishing'sign.jpg
images.description: A photo of a 'No Fishing'sign

images.filename: A Great Blue Heron standing in water.jpg
images.description: A Great Blue Heron standing in water

reasoning.explanation: The 'No Bread, No Work' sign reflects economic hardship often linked to food scarcity, which can be exacerbated by environmental issues such as drought. The Pampas eagle, native to the grasslands of South America, symbolizes the wildlife that can be affected by these environmental challenges.
reasoning.path:
EnvChallenge(NoBreadNoWork, EconomicHardship)
EnvChallenge(PampasEagle, WildlifeImpact)
Thus, NoBreadNoWork → PampasEagle

reasoning.explanation: the 'No Fishing' sign indicates restrictions related to overfishing or environmental conservation efforts, which impacts the Great Blue Heron, a bird that relies on fish for food and is affected by the health of aquatic ecosystems
reasoning.path:
EnvChallenge(NoFishingSign, ConservationIssue)
EnvChallenge(GreatBlueHeron, EcosystemImpact)
Thus, NoFishingSign → GreatBlueHeron
